name: Little Lamb Lofty Dream
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "Jump".

Game Description  

Little Lamb Lofty Dream is a short platformer about chasing your dreams and perserverance.

Key Features

  • Baahh
  • Break free from your boring live on the farm.
  • Convert your perserverance into a mighty charge jump and use it to climb up into the sky!
  • Don't get discouraged if you fall down. Keep trying  until you reach your goal!
  • Unlock a wholesome ending.
  • A slightly sisyphean task (´:
  • A**hole Birds.

Credits

  • Densch
  • Ditzie Doodle
  • Music:
    • Happy Marimba' Royalty-Free Background Music by Audio Lounge Music
    • Happy background music orchestra loop by migfus20
    • Sleeping fairy loop by rhodesmas
  • Soundeffects are all from freesound.org
